Posts.Content: My grandmother on my moms side of the family had breast cancer and my grandpa on my dads side had brain cancer (i think) and my aunt on my dads side has breast cancer so when i found out that it was genetic i was worried that i might have it, and i know for sure that i do not want to go through all the treatments like my aunt does, she had to go through kemotherapy and then she had to have one of her breasts removed and i just dont want that to happen to me.
Posts.Title: Worried 14 Year Old

Posts.Content: I'm worried that me and my sister might have breast cancer because i heard that breast cancer was genetic and breast cancer runs on both sides of my family. Is this true? If it is what should i do?
Posts.Title: Worried 14 Year Old
